Career Objective  :-  To achieve high career growth through a continuous process of learning 
for achieving goal and keeping myself dynamic in the changing scenario to become a successful 
civil engineer and leading to best opportunity in construction industry.  
 
Work Experience :-  
 
Working as a Assistant  Engineer  in Braintech Infra Pvt Ltd , Delhi,  (client  of world known  group  
SIEMENS LTD) , from June 2017 to till now.  
Project -  constructions of A Duplex society  in Gurgaon, Haryana  . 
 
Worked as a Assistant Civil Engineer  in  Empress Infra Pvt Ltd, Ghaziabad.  From july 2016 to 
May 2017.  
Project - -  Jiit swimming pools &  fun ,  in Greater Noida, Delhi -Ncr . 
 
 
Responsibilities  : 
 
➢  Planning and execution of works as per design & drawing.  
➢ Maintain  quality standards for all structural works.  
➢ Preparation bar bending schedules, sub contractors bills etc.  
➢ Execute steel as per approved structural design  
➢ Checking & monitoring the quality of RCC works as foundations, columns, beams, walls , 
slabs etc.  
➢ Checking the quality of concrete strengths regarding the grade.  
➢ Checking the quality of steel and grade of concrete as per structural  requirement, 
diameter shape & cement.  
➢ Checking the defects like porosity, slag, excess penetration, air cracks etc.  
 
 ➢ Study of related documents such as drawings, Electricals drawings, Plans etc.  
➢ Supervision of the working labor to ensure strict conformance of methods, quality & 
safety.  
➢ Preparation of  daily, weekly, monthly, reports on work progress & evaluating as per the 
planne d schedules.  
➢ Attending the client meeting regarding the status of work.  
➢ Basic computer knowledge.  
 
Academic Qualifications  
➢ Diploma in Civil Engineering   from  Subharti   Polytechnic  University , Meerut with 66% 
marks in 2016 . 
➢ Diploma in  Auto CAD & STAD.PRO   from H R CAD center, Delhi  
➢ 12th passed  (PCM)  from U.P Board with 65%  marks in 2013.  
➢ 10th passed from C.B.S.E board in 2011 with 70%  marks in 2011.  
 
Acheivements  
➢ Participation   in the All Engineers Conference, Organised   by SIEMENS LTD , held at 
Gurgaon, Haryana . 
➢ Got 1st Prize by our DGM for preparing Bills with in 10 days.
